full_summary:
# Tender Notice: W857A-24TR04 Responsive Maintenance Services

## Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bids for the provision of cost-effective maintenance and minor improvement services for the Crown-owned portfolio under the Canadian Forces Housing Agency (CFHA) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND). The scope of work is detailed in Annex A: Statement of Work.

## Important Dates

* **Solicitation Date**: December 5, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 2, 2024, 14:00 EST (Extended closing time; disregard previous Ariba Discovery posting response deadline)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: April 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2026

## Tender Information

* **Procurement Category**: Service
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer
* **Trade Agreements**: This opportunity aligns with multiple trade agreements, including the Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA) and the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

## Delivery Locations
The services are required for the province of Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region).

## Contact Information
For questions or clarification, please contact Martin Gauthier of the PSPC/DPGS at [martin.gauthier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:martin.gauthier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) or refer to the tender notice at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18194219?extsite=MTgxOTQyMTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18194219?extsite=MTgxOTQyMTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==). (Please note: Attendance for the optional teleconference is required; please confirm attendance by December 15, 2023, at 14:00 EST) [cont.](### Optional Teleconference
A teleconference is scheduled for potential bidders to clarify questions and discuss the needs of this opportunity. The teleconferences will be conducted in English and French.

[End] (Converted rewritten entry)
